name: Dry Shashlik Sticks Recipe | Rida Aftab | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Dry Shashlik Sticks Recipe: Boneless Chicken Â½ kg Ginger Garlic Paste 2 tsp Cumin Seeds (crushed) 1 tsp Lemon Juice 2 tsp Mustard Paste 2 tsp Soy Sauce 2 tsp Black Pepper 1 tsp Salt 1 tsp Shashlik Sticks as required Capsicum 1 Onions 2 Tomatoes 2 Oil as required
instructions: In a bowl, add Boneless Chicken, Ginger Garlic Paste, Mustard Paste, Soy Sauce, Lemon Juice, Black Pepper, Salt and mix. Now take a stick and palce a piece of Chicken,then Capsicum ,Onions, and Tomatoes. Fill all the sticks in the same way. Fry in a heat oil.
